complexity.title: Complexity
complexity.description: Complexity of the file representing how much cognitive load is needed to overview the whole file

logic_complexity.title: Logic complexity
logic_complexity.description: Complexity of the file based on number of paths through the code, similar to cyclomatic complexity

comment_lines.title: Comment lines
comment_lines.description: Number of lines containing either a comment or commented-out code

loc.title: Lines of Code
loc.description: Lines of code including empty lines and comments

rloc.title: Real Lines of Code
rloc.description: Number of lines that contain at least one character which is neither a whitespace nor a tabulation nor part of a comment

number_of_functions.title: Number of functions
number_of_functions.description: The number of functions or methods present in the file. Does not include anonymous or lambda functions.

max_parameters_per_function.title: Maximum parameters per function
max_parameters_per_function.description: The maximum number of parameters a function or method has for this file.

min_parameters_per_function.title: Minimum parameters per function
min_parameters_per_function.description: The minimum number of parameters a function or method has for this file.

median_parameters_per_function.title: Median parameters per function
median_parameters_per_function.description: The median number of parameters a function or method has for this file.

mean_parameters_per_function.title: Mean parameters per function
mean_parameters_per_function.description: The mean number of parameters a function or method has for this file.

max_complexity_per_function.title: Maximum complexity per function
max_complexity_per_function.description: The maximum complexity in the body of a function of this file.

min_complexity_per_function.title: Minimum complexity per function
min_complexity_per_function.description: The minimum number of complexity in the body of a function of this file.

mean_complexity_per_function.title: Mean complexity per function
mean_complexity_per_function.description: The mean complexity found in the body of a function of this file.

median_complexity_per_function.title: Median complexity per function
median_complexity_per_function.description: The median complexity found in the body of a function of this file.

max_rloc_per_function.title: Maximum real lines of code in a function
max_rloc_per_function.description: The maximum number of real lines of code in a function of this file.

min_rloc_per_function.title: Minimum real lines of code in a function
min_rloc_per_function.description: The minimum number of real lines of code in a function of this file.

mean_rloc_per_function.title: Mean real lines of code in a function
mean_rloc_per_function.description: The mean number of real lines of code in a function of this file.

median_rloc_per_function.title: Median real lines of code in a function
median_rloc_per_function.description: The median number of real lines of code in a function of this file.

long_method.title: Long Method
long_method.description: Code smell showing the number of functions with more than 10 real lines of code (rloc)

long_parameter_list.title: Long Parameter List
long_parameter_list.description: Code smell showing the number of functions with more than 4 parameters

excessive_comments.title: Excessive Comments
excessive_comments.description: Code smell showing whether a file has more than 10 comment lines

comment_ratio.title: Comment Ratio
comment_ratio.description: The ratio of comment lines to real lines of code (rloc)
